EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm-Event-PCF-Perficient Workshop_MO_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/stl]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in St. Louis. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, October 18, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM Location: Perficient, 555 Maryville University Drive, Suite 600, St. Louis, MO 63141
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact Chris Busch at cbusch@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cbusch@pivotal.io]]>.
